name: Clark County PH- COVID Vaccine Site
address: Woodland High School 1500 Dike Access Road, Woodland WA, 98674
info:
The Woodland High School vaccination site is providing 2nd dose Pfizer vaccine.

Please do not arrive more than 10 minutes before your scheduled appointment. Arriving too early can lead to longer waiting times. 

You will be asked to remain at the vaccination site for 15 to 30 minutes after being vaccinated. Medical personnel will be monitoring you for possible reactions. Severe reactions are rare. 

What to bring:
•	Identification: If you have identification or some other proof of your date of birth, please bring it. This helps to ensure registration information is accurate. But ID is not required for vaccination. 
•	Face covering: Face coverings must be worn while at the COVID-19 vaccination site. 
•	Please wear a short-sleeved shirt or shirt with loose sleeves that can be pulled up. You will receive your COVID-19 vaccine in your upper arm. 

El lugar de vacunación en la Escuela Preparatoria Woodland está proporcionando la segunda dosis de la vacuna Pfizer.

Por favor, no llegue más de 10 minutos antes de su cita. Llegar con demasiada antelación puede causar tiempos de espera más largos.

Se le pedirá que permanezca en el centro de vacunación de 15 a 30 minutos después de ser vacunado. El personal médico le vigilará para detectar posibles reacciones. Las reacciones graves son poco frecuentes.  

Qué debe traer:
•	Identificación: Si tiene un documento de identitificación, o documento con fecha de nacimiento, por favor tráigalo. Esto ayuda a asegurar que la información de registro es correcta. Pero no es necesario presentar un documento de identidad para la vacunación.  
•	Prenda para cubrirse la cara: Debe llevar una prenda para cubrirse la cara mientras esté en el centro de vacunación de COVID-19.  
•	Por favor, lleve una camisa de mangas cortas o una camisa con mangas sueltas que se puedan subir. Usted recibirá la vacuna contra la COVID-19 en la parte superior del brazo.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Clark County PH- COVID Vaccine Site
address: Woodland High School 1500 Dike Access Road, Woodland WA, 98674
info:
The Woodland High School vaccination site is providing the Johnson & Johnson vaccine. The Johnson & Johnson vaccine requires only one dose; you will not need to return for a second dose.

Please do not arrive more than 10 minutes before your scheduled appointment. Arriving too early can lead to longer waiting times. 

You will be asked to remain at the vaccination site for 15 to 30 minutes after being vaccinated. Medical personnel will be monitoring you for possible reactions. Severe reactions are rare. 

What to bring:
•	Identification: If you have identification or some other proof of your date of birth, please bring it. This helps to ensure registration information is accurate. But ID is not required for vaccination. 
•	Face covering: Face coverings must be worn while at the COVID-19 vaccination site. 
•	Please wear a short-sleeved shirt or shirt with loose sleeves that can be pulled up. You will receive your COVID-19 vaccine in your upper arm. 

El lugar de vacunación en la Woodland High School está proporcionando la vacuna Johnson & Johnson. La vacuna Johnson & Johnson sólo es una dosis; usted no tendrá que regresar por una segunda dosis.

Por favor, no llegue más de 10 minutos antes de su cita. Llegar con demasiada antelación puede causar tiempos de espera más largos.

Se le pedirá que permanezca en el centro de vacunación de 15 a 30 minutos después de ser vacunado. El personal médico le vigilará para detectar posibles reacciones. Las reacciones graves son poco frecuentes.  

Qué debe traer:
•	Identificación: Si tiene un documento de identitificación, o documento con fecha de nacimiento, por favor tráigalo. Esto ayuda a asegurar que la información de registro es correcta. Pero no es necesario presentar un documento de identidad para la vacunación.  
•	Prenda para cubrirse la cara: Debe llevar una prenda para cubrirse la cara mientras esté en el centro de vacunación de COVID-19.  
•	Por favor, lleve una camisa de mangas cortas o una camisa con mangas sueltas que se puedan subir. Usted recibirá la vacuna contra la COVID-19 en la parte superior del brazo.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Skagit County Public Health- Fairgrounds
address: Skagit County Fairgrounds 1410 Virginia St., Mount Vernon WA, 98273
info:
Pfizer Dose 1 & 2 Vaccine Clinic 
•	North Entrance to Skagit County Fairgrounds 1410 Virginia Street, Mount Vernon WA
•	Child watching provided
•	Vaccination process will take approximately 1 hour.  Wheel chairs and accessible parking available for people with mobility challenges.
•	All forms available in English and Spanish.  Spanish language interpretation provided.  
•	Dose 2 appointments scheduled 3 weeks following 

We are unable to vaccinate people who have received another vaccine of any type within 14 days OR those that have severe allergic reactions to vaccines or injectable medications.


Clínica de vacunas de primer y Segundo dosis Pfizer
•	Entrada norte al recinto ferial del condado de Skagit 1410 Virginia Street, Mount Vernon WA
•	Vigilancia de niños proveída
•	El proceso de vacunación durará aproximadamente 1 hora. Sillas de ruedas y estacionamiento accesible para personas con problemas de movilidad.
•	Todos los formularios están disponibles en inglés y español. Interpretación en español será proveída.

No podemos vacunar a personas que hayan recibido otra vacuna de cualquier tipo durante los ultimos 14 días O personas que tengan reacciones alérgicas graves a vacunas o medicamentos inyectables.
Citas reservadas 3 semanas después para la segunda dosis.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Arlington Airport Covid-19 Vaccine Site
info:
*************THIS IS A PFIZER 2nd DOSE CLINIC********** 

Everyone 12 and older in Washington is eligible for COVID-19 vaccination. 

Please also note that, even if you are otherwise eligible, you must be 18 or older for the Moderna or Johnson & Johnson vaccine, and 12 or older for the Pfizer vaccine (parent/guardian must be present to sign the consent form). 

Appointments are highly recommended but not required. Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay between 15-30 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. Medical staff will be on hand. A mask must be worn at all times during the appointment, and please wear clothing with short or loose sleeves. 

****IF YOU ARE SCHEDULING YOUR 2ND DOSE APPOINTMENT, YOU MUST PROVIDE PROOF OF 1ST DOSE (example: vaccination card, medical record, myir.net immunization record)****
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Range Community Clinic - COVID Vaccine Clinic
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Pliable, LLC Covid-19 Vaccine Site
address: Neighborhood House High Point | 6400 sylvan way SW, seattle wa, 98126
vaccines: Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine
info:
Hello! We warmly welcome you to Pliable’s mobile COVID-19 vaccination clinic at Neighborhood House in West Seattle on Saturday, June 5th, 2021. 

This vaccination event is administering the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine (1st or 2nd doses!). We also offer Johnson&Johnson (1 dose shot)

Pfizer is a two-dose vaccination series.
If you have had your 1st dose, please bring your CDC vaccination card with you to your 2nd-dose appointment.


Pliable LLC is a nurse practitioner-led organization for mindfully-driven healthcare. In alignment with Washington State Department of Health’s (DOH) equitable COVID-19 vaccine distribution strategies, our goal is to equitably and compassionately serve those communities disproportionately impacted by COVID-19 and help fill in vaccine access gaps. 


Please read the CDC and WA DOH information regarding COVID-19 Vaccinations and have your questions answered BEFORE REGISTERING. Resources can be found at: https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/Vaccine https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/pfizer/pfizer-bioNTech-faqs.html 
https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/janssen/index.html

The American Academy of Pediatrics’ Endorsement & Facts can be found at: https://www.aappublications.org/news/2021/05/12/cdc-aap-pfizer-covid-vaccine-teens-051221.
.
You/Legal Guardian should have accessed and read the EUA fact sheet prior to registering. 
.
The Fact Sheet for Pfizer vaccination can be found at: https://www.fda.gov/media/144414/download 

The Fact Sheet for Johnson and Johnson vaccination can be found at: 
https://www.fda.gov/media/146305/download

For resources on side effects and post vaccination expectations: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/expect/after.html
.
By proceeding and scheduling online you are consenting to the following terms below as the patient or surrogate decision maker for the patient, including minors. 
• I certify that I am/my child is at least 12 years of age if I am selecting Pfizer, or 18+ if selecting Johnson&Johnson
• I understand it is not possible to predict all possible side effects or complications associated with receiving the Pfizer COVID-19 or Johnson&Johnson vaccine. 
• I understand the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has authorized the emergency use of this vaccine, which is not an FDA approved vaccine in this patient population. I understand the nature, alternatives, benefits and risks of vaccination, to the extent they are known at this time. 
• I am encouraged to sign up with v-safe: https://vsafe.cdc.gov/ 
• I acknowledge that I have been advised to remain near the vaccination location for observation for 15 minutes after administration, 30 mins if I have a prior history of allergic reactions to vaccines. 
• I give my consent to Pliable LLC, including licensed employees, volunteers, and partners, to administer the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine OR Johnson&Johnson COVID-19 vaccine as described above. 
• I authorize and understand Pliable LLC may be required to or may voluntarily disclose my vaccine-related health information to my insurance plan, state or federal registries, and/or other public health authorities, for purposes of payment or health care operations. 
• I understand that I am not creating a patient relationship with Pliable LLC by participating in vaccination. I understand Pliable LLC is not acting as my medical provider. Vaccination does not replace treatment by my medical provider. I agree I will seek medical advice, care and treatment from a medical provider if I have questions or concerns, or if I experience side effects. 
• I have been provided expectations for the day of my vaccination.
• I acknowledge that I have read the vaccine Fact Sheet and agree to these terms and conditions. 
.
On the day of your appointment: 
• Registration and attestation serves as consent. Minors will NOT need to bring a formal signed parental consent on day of clinic.  
• Vaccination is available regardless of your citizenship or immigration status. 
• If you have insurance, please include this information during your online registration. Insurance is NOT required, you will not be billed, the vaccination is FREE TO ALL. Insurance will cover administrative costs if available. 
• Wear a short-sleeved shirt or clothing that allows access to your upper arm. • Masks are required at all times at the clinic. If you do not have a mask one will be provided to you. 
• Please arrive no earlier than 10 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time. Appointment cannot be guaranteed if you arrive late. • Do not visit the site if you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 on the day of your appointment. 
• If you have a history of serious allergic reactions (anaphylaxis) and are prescribed an epinephrine auto injector (Epipen, etc) please bring this to your vaccination appointment and notify clinical staff. 
.
HAPPY VACCINATION DAY!
.
www.bepliable.com
.
If you need to cancel, please click on “Cancel” link in your confirmation email. If you need to change your appointment time, please click on “Reschedule” in your confirmation email link to check if there are other time slots available. If you need to change the date, cancel this appointment and schedule another one. We cannot guarantee that you will be able to reschedule for the desired date and time.

This confirms your appointment but does not guarantee you have met all criteria to receive your vaccine. Any appointment which is made by a patient who is not eligible based upon current vaccine eligibility will be cancelled prior to the date of the clinic.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Thurston County Public Health Medical Reserve Corp
address: Rochester High School, 19800 Carper Rd SW, Rochester WA, 98579
info:
This is a Pfizer vaccination event for anyone age 12 and older. 

• This is a walk-in clinic at Rochester High School held in the gym. The clinic is from 8:00AM - 1:00PM. • All minors 12 to 17 years old must receive parent or guardian consent to receive a COVID-19 vaccine. This must be done in PrepMod when registering for an appointment. Parents or guardians do not have to be present at the time of vaccination if they signed the consent form online during registration. • Please bring a form of identification with you to your appointment - ID card, passport, or other document with your name and birthday on it. • Wear a short-sleeved shirt, but dress with warm layers. • Waiting at least 15 minutes after vaccination is required.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
